mapper.insert:
SELECT UUID() as ID
insert into app_prebuy_parkrecord
id,
user_id,
city_code,
area_code,
parkrecord_id,
berth_code,
park_name,
plate_no,
arrival_time,
departure_time,
prebuy_count,
prebuy_duration,
over_time,
photo_count,
photo_url,
status,
is_departure,
t.note,
t.create_time,
t.update_time

mapper.update:
update app_order_parkrecord t set
user_id=#{userId},
city_code= #{cityCode},
area_code=#{areaCode},
parkrecord_id=#{parkrecordId},
berth_code=#{berthCode},
park_name=#{parkName},
plate_no=#{plateNo},
arrival_time=#{arrivalTime},
departure_time=#{departureTime},
prebuy_count=#{prebuyCount},
prebuy_duration=#{prebuyDuration},
over_time= #{overTime},
photo_count=#{photoCount},
photo_url=#{photoUrl},
status=#{status},
is_departure=#{isDeparture},
flag=#{flag},
create_time=#{createTime},
update_time=#{updateTime},
where id= #{id}
mapper.select: select from app_prebuy_parkrecord t where t.id = #{id}
